page.title: 02FORDHAM PLAYGROUP
page.content: In the village hall on Monday and Wednesday mornings a{playgroup}is held. It is for children aged 3-5.It is run by two ladies, with three helpers. Approximately 20 children attend from 9.45am until 12,15pm. The {play materials}are sand, play-dough, paints, dressing-up, jigsaws, lego etc., climbing-frame, and books.It is 80p per morning per child, including milk and a biscuit. At least once a year a photographer will come and take separate or family photographs.Road {safety}plays an important part in a childs life so a person comes and talks to the children about it once a year.At christmas they hold a party. When a child has a birthday all the children at playgroup sing Happy Birthday and share the cake. They go on an outing at least 3 times a year.
